item.title: Hugo Framework
item.description: First of all you will need to setup a Hugo site. You can follow the Hugo’s Quick Start Guide for that. After you’re done with that, it’s time for installing Engimo! Installing Engimo There are two different ways you can install Engimo: As clone sh git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/achary/engimo themes/engimo As submodule sh git submodule add https://github.com/achary/engimo themes/engimo This will add Engimo’s repository as a submodule to your site’s repository.
